title: After "I Do " A Marriage Map
description: INDIEBRAG MEDALLION HONOREE Happily Ever After or Divorce?“If we had conformed to statistics, my husband and I should have been divorced long ago... It’s been more than thirty years now, and our marriage is three decades stronger. We beat the odds. I want to tell you how we did that, because you can do it, too.”
author: P.J. LaRue
